resources.string: Name field is invalid! Make sure you only enter letters of the alphabet.
The registration field is invalid make sure you have entered only digits and dots.
The first note field is invalid. Make sure you have entered a number between 0 and 10.
The second note field is invalid. Make sure you have entered a number between 0 and 10.
The third note field is invalid. Make sure you have entered a number between 0 and 10.
The first note field is empty.
The second note field is empty.
The third note field is empty.
Your student list is empty. Click on the button below to add a new student to the list.
